alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Teller (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued July 26 at 4:10PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY HEALTH ADVISORY FOR OZONE FROM 1000 PM TUESDAY UNTIL 800 PM TUESDAY... The Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment has issued the following... WHAT...Air Quality Health Advisory for Ozone. WHERE...northern Teller and northwestern El Paso Counties. Locations include, but are not limited to Woodland Park, Florissant, Colorado Springs, Manitou Springs, and Monument. WHEN...1000 PM Tuesday July 26 to 800 PM Tuesday July 26 IMPACTS...Ozone concentrations are expected to reach the Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups category Tuesday afternoon and evening, before returning to more moderate levels by late Tuesday evening. HEALTH INFORMATION...Public Health Recommendations: Increasing likelihood of respiratory symptoms and breathing discomfort in active children and adults and people with lung disease, such as asthma. Active children and adults, and people with lung disease, such as asthma, should reduce prolonged or heavy outdoor exertion.
